# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/dcDec.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dcDec.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/dcList.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dcList.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/dcOct.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dcOct.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> dcDec.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP dcDec.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} dcDec.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir.prn dcDec.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED dcDec.cir)
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> dcDec.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP dcDec.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} dcDec.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir.prn dcDec.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcDec.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED dcDec.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> dcList.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP dcList.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} dcList.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir.prn dcList.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED dcList.cir)
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> dcList.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP dcList.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} dcList.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir.prn dcList.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcList.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED dcList.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> dcOct.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP dcOct.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} dcOct.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir.prn dcOct.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED dcOct.cir)
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> dcOct.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP dcOct.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} dcOct.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir.prn dcOct.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}DC_UPGRADE/dcOct.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED dcOct.cir)
endif()
